name: Bazillionnaire
description:
Will you become a Bazillionaire, or lose everything trying?

Game prototype for the GMTK Game Jam 2022 !
You play as someone who's lost everything and decided to gambit the rest of their money on some dice game in a casino.

This is barely playable, but hey it's still something ! It sure was fun to make.
We'll probably add some balance changes and other game mechanics in the future, we had plans but lacked the time to execute them.

Music: Funk à 10 balles, Frédéric Lardon, from https://loyaltyfreakmusic.com/

- LoupAvecUnP & FF
